lead_paragraph: The United States national team concluded an undefeated tour of Asia yesterday with a 116-63 victory over South Korea in Seoul, its final tuneup before the world championship. LeBron James scored 23 points to help the United States run its record to 5-0 in exhibition games leading up the world championship, which begins Saturday in Japan.
